name: Ultimate Dragons
text: At the beginning of the Duel, add "Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon", "Neo Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon", and "Blue-Eyes Twin Burst Dragon" to your Extra Deck. Can be used on turn 3 and onward by revealing 2 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" in your hand to your opponent. Add "Polymerization" to your hand from outside of your Deck. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
